fusion.title: BOB Fusion: The Final Season
fusion.description: Harvest Spice by depositing into BOB apps, voting, and solving quests. Keep an eye out for special events

communityVoting.title: Community Voting
communityVoting.description: Use your Spice total to support your favourite BOB builders. Winners will be announced each week.

quests.title: Quests
quests.description: Complete a variety of on- and off-chain quests using Intract and the BOB Stake Portal to harvest an additional 62,500 Spice.

btcLstLendingStrat.title: BTC LST Lending
btcLstLendingStrat.shortDescription: Use BTC LSTs as collateral to borrow other assets
btcLstLendingStrat.longDescription: Deposit BTC LSTs into a lending market on BOB and use them as collateral to borrow other assets.

one.description: and receive BTC LSTs on BOB.

two.description: Deposit any eligible BTC LSTs into a lending market on BOB.

three.description: Use the deposited BTC LSTs as collateral to borrow wBTC, tBTC or FBTC.

four.description: Mint more BTC LSTs with these borrowed assets.

five.description: Optional: It's possible to repeat steps 2-4 multiple times.

mintAndLendSatUsd.title: Mint and Lend satUSD
mintAndLendSatUsd.shortDescription: Mint satUSD and supply it into a lending market on BOB'

longDescription.suffix: to mint satUSD and deposit that into a lending market on BOB

one.description: and receive BTC LSTs on BOB.

three.prefix: Supply the newly minted satUSD into a

four.description: Use the deposited satUSD as collateral to borrow any BTC LST.

five.description: Optional: It's possible to repeat steps 2-4 multiple times.

longDescription.prefix: Provide liquidity into any AMM pool on
longDescription.suffix: to earn trading fees and incentives

one.suffix: to provide liquity into a DEX pool on Oku.

two.description: Maximum points will be received by providing BTC LST liquidity.

three.description: You will need to actively monitor your position, especially if it has a small range.

bridgeBtcLstToBob.title: Bridge BTC LSTs to BOB
bridgeBtcLstToBob.longDescription: If you already own BTC LSTs on other chains, you can bridge them over to BOB and start harvesting Spice.

two.description: Select the wrapped Bitcoin asset and the amount that you want to bridge.

three.description: Choose any of the existing liquid staking provider to mint your BTC LST.

apps.title: Apps Used
apps.tooltip: The number of BOB ecosystem apps that you have harvested Spice with

quests.title: Quests Completed
quests.tooltip: The number of Intract and Galxe quests that you have completed'

referrals.title: Your Referral Code
referrals.tooltip: Share this link with a friend and when they sign up, you will receive 15% of their Spice harvest as a bonus, plus 7% of the Spice harvest of anyone they refer'

tvlFallback.title: BOB TVL Progress
tvlFallback.description: No new goal at the moment. Stay tuned for updates!

login.title: Log in to View Dashboard
login.description: Grab the final opportunity to harvest Spice. Join Season 3.

userReferralModal.title: Your Active Referrals
userReferralModal.description: Here are your active referrals and the Spice they're currently earning for you. The more they earn, the more you benefit!

multipliersModal.title: Multipliers
multipliersModal.description: Deploy high priority assets into high priority DeFi protocols to maximize your Spice harvest.
multipliersModal.disclaimer: * The multipliers displayed are subject to change based on the payout structure of the respective projects.

usedAppsModal.title: Spice Earned Across Apps
usedAppsModal.description: Below is the Spice you've harvested from apps. Keep participating to increase your future harvest!

welcomeBackModal.title: Welcome to BOB Fusion
welcomeBackModal.subtitle: The final season
welcomeBackModal.description: Fusion season 3 is your last ever chance to harvest Spice. Stake your Bitcoin for the highest multipliers and refer a friend to receive a share of all the Spice they collect.
welcomeBackModal.disclaimer: Once complete, your season 3 score will be added to seasons 1 and 2 to calculate your final Spice harvest.

one.title: Step One
one.description: Step One Bridge your assets to BOB to start harvesting Spice.
one.tip: TIP: Some assets earn more Spice than others. You can see which by clicking the “View Multipliers” button.

two.title: Step Two
two.description: Use your bridged assets in apps to maximise your Spice harvest.
two.tip: TIP: Some types of apps offer greater multipliers than others. Explore the “Hot Strategies” section to learn more.

withdrawModal.title: Season 1 has ended - Welcome to Season 2!
withdrawModal.summary: Congratulations! Your initial contribution to BOB’s growth earned you {{totalSpice}} Spice! This has secured you position {{rank}} on the leaderboard for Season 1.
withdrawModal.share: <xLink>Share your success with your friends</xLink> and invite them to join the Fusion campaign, earn 15% for every Spice they harvest!
withdrawModal.seasonTwoDescription: Bridge assets, provide liquidity, transact on-chain, and expand your network through referrals to climb the leaderboard faster than ever.
withdrawModal.withdrawDescription: Don't believe in the Bitcoin Renaissance? You can withdraw your funds from the contract to your wallet on Ethereum. You will no longer earn Spice if you withdraw your assets. You will keep the Spice harvested so far.
withdrawModal.smartAccountsWarning: Unfortunately, is not possible to bridge to BOB using smart accounts. We are working on adding support for this in the near future, so follow us for future updates.

list.noApps: There are no apps to be displayed

heroBanner.title: Community Voting
heroBanner.description: Use your Spice total to support your favourite BOB builders. Winners will be announced each week.

content.one: When you vote for a project, your Spice total is added to their vote total.
content.two: Each week the projects with the most votes will receive a Spice bonus which they can distribute to their users.

one.suffix: icon next to your favourite apps

content.two: Vote for maximum three projects per week
content.three: You can change your votes at any time before the end of the weekly voting period<

pleaseNote.title: Please note:
pleaseNote.content: When you vote, you do not give away any of your harvest. Your Spice total is simply used to calculate the weight of your vote.

votingDashboard.explainer: Vote for maximum three projects per week by clicking on the flame icon

home.title: THE FIRST HYBRID L2
home.subtitle: POWERED BY BTC & ETH
home.content: Combining liquidity and security from Bitcoin and Ethereum. Mainnet live!

wallet.title: BOB Wallet
wallet.summary: View a summary of your wallet on the BOB network. DeFi positions may not be tracked.

alert.alex: Bridging ALEX is disabled because Alex Lab suffered an exploit involving the XLink bridge. For more information, kindly refer to this <xLink>announcement</xLink>.
